Package com.spacetimecat.concurrent.lock

Binary semaphore

See: Description

    Interface Description
    Lock
    Binary semaphore.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CriticalSection
    A piece of code that must not be run by multiple processes.
    WithLock
    Control construct that acquires and releases lock.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LockException
    Programming error.

Package com.spacetimecat.concurrent.lock Description

Binary semaphore

Binary semaphore has no notion of ownership.

The WithLock control construct and the CriticalSection abstraction are equivalent, but CriticalSection is a standard computer science term. 

     new WithLock(lock).run(action)
     // is the same as
     new CriticalSection(action).runWith(lock)

If you need multiple locks, see com.spacetimecat.concurrent.lock.composite.

The low level interface is Lock.
